case: Many different types of personal data are collected
quoteText:
In order for you to access certain premiums, services and to purchase products that we offer via the Site, we require you to provide us with certain information that personally identifies you ("Personal Information").
Personal Information includes the following categories of information: (1) Contact Data (such as your name, mailing address, and e-mail address).
(2) Financial Data (such as your account or credit card number).
and (3) Demographic Data (such as your zip code, age, and income).
